adrFormatAddress: 2204 Amsterdam Ave #2d, New York, NY 10032, USA

originalText.text: I remember using this company back in 2016 or 2017. Three rooms, tv mounts. Completely ruined my walls. I had to hire a contractor to repair what was damaged. I also had a floating TV stand mounted, that one of the 2 guys broke. One guy kept answering the phone for his girlfriend who was rushing him to make it home. He was more concerned about clocking out than getting the tasks completed. The installation took about 4 hours before the guys called it quits (2 men, were sent). A couple days later or so, a different person was sent out to complete the job, but stated he was not informed on what needed to be done. So I had to try to explain what I THOUGHT the previous installers was trying to accomplish. He was a bit more experienced. He learned a few trades while in prison. Overall, I would not recommend nor use this company again.

originalText.text: True professionals.. excellent work and they clean up after themselves

text.text: True professionals.. excellent work and they clean up after themselves

originalText.text: These guys were recommended by Amazon when I bought a mounting bracket to mount my television. They cane to my apt and did such a good job that I called them to help take it down when I moved a year later. They even spackled the holes back up for me for free in the wall. I looked them up in Google Maps so I can have them install TVs in my new apartment. Highly recommend their services. End result is professional grade work. And they operate quickly.
